(I've gotta question.  And just to clear things up from Jason who seems to be 
confused, Dark One's alternative modes are a biped humanoid mode AKA robot 
mode as it's being called, and a space fighter.  Squizzy is in the space 
fighter.  Not eaten, but inside.  

And did Jason take his damage from Oblitertron?  I didn't see it, but I 
deleted a few e-mails.)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
